author: Brandon Reznik
comment: After purchase I had to resync everything, and restart both the phone and the watch, but this watch face showed up eventually and it's looking great. Keep up the great work Meciej! Blessings on you and your family.
title: Looks great on my G watch R!

author: Bogdan Oprea
comment: 1 star because you use push notifications for ads to other products. I am also reporting you to google for this. I paid for this so I can have a watch face not to have adware on my phone!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello, I don't think it's against any Google Play rules, but you've got your right to be mad when such thing happens. Be sure that I'm using pushes very rarely, usually for app updates info, at most for self-promotion. Sorry for your unpleasant experience, hope you'll understand.

author: martin bentley
comment: Great watch face looks cool on my urbane 2.is it possible to add hour markers or minute markers on next update?I know its suppose to look mimilistic but it would make it better.

author: Corry Holt
comment: Gets another star when add more themes and or color options
title: Yup

author: Abdul Majid Farooqi
comment: Please add more skins and animations

author: Marcus Wilson
comment: Extremely minimal and animated.  Just perfect for the G Watch R.
title: Noice!

author: Robert Brumfield
comment: Didn't know we had to pay taxes on apps till now however its a great buy.
title: Love it
